item.description:
Hello!!!
I apologize for neglecting this club for so long. The summer is the busiest for me at work. I would love to schedule a meetup dinner on Saturday night. So, if you are at all interested. I wont cancel at all even if there is a small turnout. A lot of people have sent me different ideas about what they want to cook so I decided not to make a theme. Feel free to bring what you like to cook. It can be an appetizer, entree or dessert. I have 8 spots available but I am willing to expand, but realistically these events tend to be small. Please feel free to email me any questions or concerns or complaints=). Pairing dishes with drinks is encouraged but not mandatory. I hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: No buzzer. Will have to call to be let in.
item.name: Your favorite dish.
